properties.name: agentId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: resolveData
properties.description: By default the outpout is presented as string. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: If set, the output will be retrieved from the container after the specified previous container ID

properties.name: prevRuntimeEventIndex
properties.description: If set, the container's runtime events will be returned in the response starting from the provided previous runtime event index

properties.name: argumentsUi
properties.description: Name of the argument key to add

properties.name: value
properties.description: Value to set for the argument key

properties.name: bonusArgumentUi
properties.description: Name of the argument key to add

properties.name: bonusArgumentJson
properties.description: Agent bonus argument. Can either be a JSON string or a plain object. This bonus argument is single-use, it will only be used for the current launch. If present, it will be merged with the original argument, resulting in an effective argument that can be retrieved with buster.argument in the agentâ€™s script.

properties.name: manualLaunch
properties.description: Whether the agent will be considered as "launched manually"

properties.name: maxInstanceCount
properties.description: If set, the agent will only be launched if the number of already running instances is below the specified number

properties.name: saveArgument
properties.description: If true, argument will be saved as the default launch options for the agent

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many agents of the current user's organization

properties.name: Get Output
properties.description: Get the output of the most recent container of an agent

properties.name: Launch
properties.description: Add an agent to the launch queue
